ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: The event name for which the data was collected
Please indicate how instrument was administered:
I control my feelings by not showing them
Notes: 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

ElementDescription: When I want to feel happier about something, I change the way I'm thinking about it
Notes: 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

ElementDescription: When I'm feeling bad (e.g., sad, angry, worried), I'm careful not to show it
Notes: 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

ElementDescription: When I want to feel less bad (e.g., sad, angry, worried) about something, I change the way I'm thinking about it.
Notes: 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

ElementDescription: I keep my feelings to myself
Notes: 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer

ElementDescription: When I want to feel less bad (e.g., sad, angry, worried) about something, I think about something different.
Notes: 1= strongly disagree ; 2= disagree ; 3= half and half ; 4= agree ; 5= strongly agree ; 777= Refuse to Answer
